title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7009.4 - Religious diets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7009.4 - Religious diets

State Regulations

Pursuant to the requirements of section
7024.6
of this Title, prisoners are
entitled to observe reasonable dietary laws established by their religion. Each
facility shall provide prisoners with food items sufficient to meet such
reasonable religious dietary laws. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7009.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
